DOC.brief_summary: Multi centre, prospective, non interventional study in 200-240 UK relapsing remitting multiple sclerosis patients. Patients will complete questionnaires at baseline, 3, 6 and 12 months.
DOC.brief_title: PROFILE - Evaluation of QoL and PRO Outcomes in Patients Taking Fingolimod
DOC.detailed_description: Multi centre, prospective, non interventional study in 200-240 UK relapsing remitting multiple sclerosis patients assessing the change in QoL and PRO outcome measures from baseline to 12 months after starting fingolimod. Patients will complete 4 questionnaires at baseline (prior to first fingolimod dose), then repeat them at 3, 6 and 12 month intervals via post.
DOC.criteria: Patients prescribed Gilenya within the EU licence No previous exposure to Gilenya Patient's HCP considers patient able to complete study questionnaires Patient is between 1855 years of age There are no exclusion criteria for this study.
